work.name: Research from a class final project
work.summary: Working with Prof. Larry Guth and graduate student Siqi Wu on sieve theory in finite field projection theory

work.name: Undergraduate Research Opportunities Program (UROP)
work.summary: Working under Prof. Gigliola Staffilani and graduate student Joshua Earl Messing on the Non-Linear Schrodinger Equation

work.name: Directed Reading Program (DRP)
work.summary: Read about decoupling theory under supervision of graduate student Jiahui Yu

work.name: Directed Reading Program (DRP)
work.summary: Read about spectral geometry under supervision of graduate student Elena Kim

awards.title: International Mathematics Olympiad
awards.summary: Won Gold medal in 2019 and 2021, Silver medal in 2020, Bronze medal in 2018 and Honorable Mention in 2016
